resource.name: Current Traffic Accidents
resource.description: Listing of current active traffic accidents within the City of Fort Worth streets.  Dataset updated every 5 minutes.
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council Districts' (nnh8-mcwc) the point in column 'location_1' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'texas_census_zipcodes' (yjg4-vj9w) the point in column 'location_1' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council Districts_uniq_prepend' (fn9q-qpdm) the point in column 'location_1' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council Districts_from_qwjb_2inx' (bgtw-5uv7) the point in column 'location_1' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council_Districts2016' (qwjb-2inx) the point in column 'location_1' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: Development Permits
resource.description: All permits issued through the Planning & Development permit center. Includes building, mechanical  plumbing, garage sales and others. Data is updated monthly and may not reflect recent activity.
columns_description: Additional information about who was involved in the permit or what was included
Date the permit was filed with the city
Latitude and Longitude of the permit location

resource.name: Vehicle  Accident Data
resource.description: Accident report data. Accidents appear in the data set once the accident report is file and a submitted status is recorded with TXDOT.  This data is updated three times daily.
columns_description: Was the incident a hit and run?
Latitude and Longitude of the incident
Did a fatality occur?
Did the incident occur at an intersection?

resource.name: Crime Data
resource.description: This data comes from the police department and includes crime data sorted by offense.  To respect the privacy of juvenile offenses and witnesses the data has been generalized to the hundred block of the event.  Cases involving juvenile related data has been removed.  The data is updated  weekly.
columns_description: The Location type code description for the offense
The date the offense was reported
The type of offense
The date the offense began

The offense code. The following offenses are excluded from this dataset for legal reasons - Sexual Assault Adult, Sexual Assault Child, Sexual Assault Indecency w/child, Juvenile (17 years or younger) Runaway
The Police beat of the offense in its corresponding Patrol Division. A listing of all beats and a boundary map can be found under each Patrol Division on police.fortworthtexas.gov
The Location type code for the offense
Description of the offense
The Case Number assigned. A case can have multiple offenses
The Police division of the offense:  North, East, South, West, Northwest, & Central.
Case Number and Offense Code for unique record retrieval
The city where the offense occurred ("Fort Worth")
A code which indicates if the offense was C = Completed,  A = Attempted
The state abbreviation code where the offense occurred ("TX")
The location of the offense via Longitude and Latitude coordinates for mapping purposes
Hundred block where the incident took place
The Council District Code where the offense occurred. A listing of all Council Districts and maps of each can be found at fortworthtexas.gov/government/

resource.name: Certificate of Occupancy
resource.description: Certificates of Occupancy issued by Planning & Development. Data is updated monthly and may not reflect recent activity.
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council Districts' (nnh8-mcwc) the point in column 'location_1_2' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'texas_census_zipcodes' (yjg4-vj9w) the point in column 'location_1_2' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: Code Violations
resource.description: These are records of violation cases from the Code Compliance Department. Data is inclusive of actual cases and does not include complaints. Violations are things such as tall grass and weeds, junk vehicles, trash and debris, substandard structures, and other code violations. This data is updated three times a day, Monday through Friday.

resource.name: Health Data
resource.description:
Health Inspection Reports for City of Fort Worth businesses.  Includes restaurants, swimming pools and child care facilities within the City of Fort Worth.  Dataset updated every week.  

** Note - the City of Fort Worth went to a new Health Inspection system on August 16, 2019 and are still working on getting the updated data out of it.   As of right now, the data in this dataset is only good thru August 15, 2019.  ***
